```{r}
#Diamonds

```

```{r}
# use dplyr commands to create a diamonds data table
# that shows columns price,x,y,and z.
# Also price value should be greater that 17000
```

```{r}
filtered_diamonds <- diamonds %>%
  filter(price > 17000) %>%
  select(price, x, y, z)
head(filtered_diamonds)
```
